trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of parameters relevant to an <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"></xref> as well as their respective mappings to columns in a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
The number of parameters in the collection must equal the number of parameter placeholders within the command text, otherwise the .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB might raise an error.
Adds the specified <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> to add to the collection.
The index of the new <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> object.
The specified in the value parameter is already added to this or another .
The value parameter is null.
Adds the specified <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> object to the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Object"></xref>.
The index of the new <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> object in the collection.
Adds an <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref>, given the parameter name and data type.
The name of the parameter.
One of the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType"></xref> values.
The index of the new <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> object.
Adds an <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref> given the parameter name and value.
Use caution when using this overload of the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection.Add%2A> method to specify integer parameter values.
Because this overload takes a `value` of type <xref:System.Object>, you must convert the value to an <xref:System.Object> type when the value is zero, as the following C# example demonstrates.
If you do not perform this conversion, the compiler will assume you are attempting to call the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection.Add%2A> overload.
The name of the parameter.
The <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter.Value"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> to add to the collection.
The index of the new <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> object.
The value parameter is not an .
Adds an <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref> given the parameter name, data type, and column length.
The name of the parameter.
One of the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType"></xref> values.
The length of the column.
The index of the new <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> object.

Adds an <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref> given the parameter name, data type, column length, and source column name.
The name of the parameter.
One of the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType"></xref> values.
The length of the column.
The name of the source column.
The index of the new <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> object.
Adds an array of values to the end of the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Array"></xref> values to add.
Adds an array of <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> values to the end of the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Data.OleDbParameter"></xref> values to add.
Adds a value to the end of the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref>.
The name of the parameter.
The value to be added.
An <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> object.
Removes all <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> objects from the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref>.
Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> is in this <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> value.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> is in the collection; otherwise `false`.
Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Object"></xref> is in this <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> value.
`true` if the contains value; otherwise `false`.
Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.String"></xref> is in this <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.String"></xref> value.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref> contains the value; otherwise `false`.

Copies all the elements of the current <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref> to the specified one-dimensional <xref href="System.Array"></xref> starting at the specified destination <xref href="System.Array"></xref> index.
The one-dimensional <xref href="System.Array"></xref> that is the destination of the elements copied from the current <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref>.
A 32-bit integer that represents the index in the <xref href="System.Array"></xref> at which copying starts.

Copies all the elements of the current <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref> to the specified <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref> starting at the specified destination index.
The <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref> that is the destination of the elements copied from the current <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref>.
A 32-bit integer that represents the index in the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref> at which copying starts.
Returns an integer that contains the number of elements in the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref>.
Read-only.
The number of elements in the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref> as an integer.
Returns an enumerator that iterates through the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref>.
Gets the location of the specified <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> within the collection.
The <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> object in the collection to find.
The zero-based location of the specified <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> that is a <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> within the collection.
The location of the specified <xref href="System.Object"></xref> within the collection.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to find.
The zero-based location of the specified <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that is a <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref> within the collection.
Gets the location of the specified <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> with the specified name.
The case-sensitive name of the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> to find.
The zero-based location of the specified <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> with the specified case-sensitive name.
Inserts a <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> object into the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref> at the specified index.
The zero-based index at which value should be inserted.
An <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> object to be inserted in the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref>.
Inserts a <xref href="System.Object"></xref> into the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref> at the specified index.
The zero-based index at which value should be inserted.
A <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to be inserted in the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref>.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref> has a fixed size.
Read-only.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref> has a fixed size; otherwise `false`.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref> is read-only.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref> is read only; otherwise `false`.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref> is synchronized.
Read-only.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref> is synchronized; otherwise `false`.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> with the specified name.
The name of the parameter to retrieve.
The <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> with the specified name.
The name specified does not exist.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> at the specified index.
The zero-based index of the parameter to retrieve.
The <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> at the specified index.
The index specified does not exist.
Removes the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> object to remove from the collection.
The parameter is not a <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref>.
The parameter does not exist in the collection.
Removes the <xref href="System.Object"></xref> object from the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to be removed from the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref>.
Removes the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref> at the specified index.
The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> object to remove.
Removes the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref> at the specified parameter name.
The name of the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter"></xref> object to remove.
Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref>.
Read-only.
An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection"></xref>.
